item.title: Will You Save With Fractional Line Services?
item.description:
You might think ordering less bandwidth would save you money, but when it comes to telecom lines, that’s not always the case. While getting a fraction of a T1 line’s capacity seemed like a good idea for those who didn’t need the full 1.5 Mbps, the cost savings weren’t as significant as one might expect. item.title: Price Your Telecom Lines Before You Move
item.description:
When choosing a location for your new or relocating business, telecommunications costs are an important factor to consider. item.title: AboveNet Offers Gigabit Ethernet For Enterprises
item.description:
Gigabit Ethernet (GigE) is now the standard for local area networks (LANs) in most businesses. However, many organizations still struggle with slow wide area network (WAN) connections, creating a bottleneck. Today, using slower WAN technologies like DS3 or even OC3 fiber alongside a Gigabit LAN is comparable to connecting a small straw to a fire hose. Historically, slower WAN speeds were sufficient, but today’s business environment demands much faster connections.
